autoFetch.name: Automatically Fetch
autoFetch.note: Automatically fetch for updates in a defined period.

useQueue.name: Potato Mode
useQueue.note: Runs updates in a queue, making update checks on low-end PCs less heavy.

fetchPeriod.name: Update Fetch Period
fetchPeriod.note: Period between automatically fetches for updates. (in minutes)

updateCountOnSettingsGear.name: Show Update Count on Settings Gear
updateCountOnSettingsGear.note: Shows an unread badge of pending updates on the settings gear.

updateCountOnSettingsTab.name: Show Update Count on Settings Tab
updateCountOnSettingsTab.note: Shows an unread badge of pending updates on the settings tab.
